item.title: Machine Learning Glossary
item.description: Reference Machine Learning Glossary - Google for Developers activation function A function that enables neural networks to learn non-linear (complex) relationships between features and the label. Popupar activation functions include: ReLU Sigmoid Tanh backpropagation The algorithm that implements gradient descent in neural networks. Training a neural network involves many iterations of the following two-pass cycle: During the forward pass, the system processes a batch of examples to yild prediction(s). The system compares each prediction to each label value.
